website_summaries.verdict: A nice practical sink that performs well.
pros: Sink arrives quickly and has a good style
It is small, but has enough space for a soap rest
cons: You may need to get your own mounting hardware

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my tiny bathroom, pain to install!
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving the box of the sink (not the packaging box) looked like it had been sitting in the rain. Didn't affect the sink, however the sink had one minor scratch. The size of this sink is TINY.... like woah pictures didn't look that tiny! BUT it is perfect for my tiny bathroom and gets the job done. My husband wasn't very happy about installation, no instructions and needed to buy additional parts. Overall it works great!! I included a picture with hand for size reference!!
customer_reviews.author: Expat

customer_reviews.title: Cute sink but damaged and seller is NOT reliable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this (white) sink for a tiny guest bathroom. It was the perfect size for my new small bathroom at the right price. When it arrived it was clearly damaged and NOT white. It is more an antique white, not a bright white as I had hoped. My husband tried to polish it out the scratches with no luck. I emailed the seller and received no response. Sadly, we decided to return the sink. It has been 20 days since we returned the item and still no refund.
customer_reviews.author: M. Owen

customer_reviews.title: If you need a tiny sink, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: I am remodeling a home I bought to flip that has a tiny, tiny 1/2 bath. This sink fits the order perfectly. Not only is it small enough to fit the space, it is deep enough to get your hands under the water, has a place for soap to rest, a decorative design on the wall mount area and the price was very affordable. I have no complaints with this purchase. It covers all the bases.
customer_reviews.author: Loves corgis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the sink itself. The problem is the mounting bracket. Everyone’s states that you can alter the bracket or use a different bracket, I think this is unacceptable. I had to use the bracket from my old sink, cut pieces off of it weld them to the new bracket. If I purchase a new product the accessories to use that product should be substantial. This absolutely was not. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A

customer_reviews.title: Bad bracket
customer_reviews.text: As pointed out by many buyers, this wall mount sink comes with a bracket that almost impossible to use. No instruction whatsoever. You either need to find a different bracket or adjust it to fit, which doesn’t make sense. The sink hole is not perfectly round so the standard pop up drain stopper wouldn’t fit. I have to find a smaller one in order to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: dnl

customer_reviews.title: but like previous purchasers have stated
customer_reviews.text: I have a door clearance issue which this sink will solve, but like previous purchasers have stated, the mounting bracket as supplied will probably crack the sink because the bracket is too wide to get a good grip on the sink porcellin. I'm about ready to cut it up with my torch to get it to fit better. Also, there are/were no instructions with this sink--just thought I'd missed something, before I looked at the comments about this bracket. IF YOU USE THIS BRACKET AS SUPPLIED, I WILL GUARANTEE THAT SOMEBODY WILL CRACK IT IF THEY LEAN ANY WEIGHT ONTO IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better wall mount bracket
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, nice finish. Only issue is the mounting bracket seems inadequate so I will make my own. The supplied bracket, in my opinion, would never be substantial enough to hold the sink onto the wall. I suppose the expectation is to use some adhesive caulk behind it with a bracket. The sink is one of very few we could find in this small size. Perfect for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Rf Foley

customer_reviews.title: I think Fine Fixtures should offer a porcelain or ceramic "pipe shroud" ...
customer_reviews.text: It's really an attractive sink, but so tiny that the word "cute" comes to mind. However, the pipes that are a necessary part of every wall sink are really detracting from the appearance of the sink. I think Fine Fixtures should offer a porcelain or ceramic "pipe shroud" to fit. There is a definite drawback to having a tiny sink: I have nowhere to put a pump bottle of hand soap (my faucet fixtures are in the way) and will have to use bar soap in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wallitt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my little lake house and it is perfect. The only thing is mounting the sink. I followed another reviewer instruction on how to mount the sink and had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: WANDA K

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, For my basement bathroom. It was a perfect fit. So I’d have more space.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: ... tiny bathroom off our master bedroom and this was perfect. It replaces a 27" pedestal sink which was ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny bathroom off our master bedroom and this was perfect. It replaces a 27" pedestal sink which was far too big. Now my knees aren't hitting the sink when I have to use the facilities and I can easily enter and exit the shower without harm. Love. Love. Love.
customer_reviews.author: ssdragonfly13

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we need
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what we needed in our small bathroom . have not installed yet , but seems it will be perfect for our needs . fast shipping , great price, seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong bracket for sink
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to install this sink, I could not get attached to the bracket supplied with the sink. After many attempts I removed the bracket and tried it on the bench. The bracket is approximately 3/8 of an inch too wide to accommodate the sink. Needless to say I spent almost an hour before I discovered the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Ricker

customer_reviews.title: A bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Good, compact sink. It was smaller than we expected but works great
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Small but works for me
customer_reviews.text: You can see the dimensions when you order this sink but you never really know until you actually see it. It is very small but perfect for my needs. My recommendation is to buy the smallest faucet you can for this sink because a normal sized faucet comes out at least half the depth of the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Madukes

customer_reviews.title: It's so tiny! I love it, great fit for a small bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink, however you do have to modify the mounting bracket that is provided, it's as if it's too big for the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our small
customer_reviews.text: The TINIEST little sink! Perfect for our small, first floor, powder room. I paired with a traditional 4" spread faucet (Kingston Brass, Victorian collection) and it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Need to shape mounting bracket yourself
customer_reviews.text: This sink would have been perfect, but you have to shape the mounting bracket it comes with to fit the sink which we don't have the tools for... if you have that capability and a tiny bathroom, this will work for you
customer_reviews.author: Allie M.

customer_reviews.title: What is that piece of junk made out of? ...
customer_reviews.text: What is that piece of junk made out of? It looks ceramic, not cast iron. When snugging up the anchor bolt in the wall, the area around on hole cracked and broke right off. In all the years I've installed wall-mount sinks I have never had that happen before. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Petite Bath Sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made little sink. Perfect for added bath without enough space for a standard vanity sink. The mounting bracket as discussed in other reviews, could be a better fit, but for someone with experience adapting items to fit odd conditions in old remodels, this is easy to adjust. Use extra lags and patience!!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great product & Company service
customer_reviews.text: For me this sink is a little gem. Very hard to find anything in Hawaii that even comes close to this. The product appears very well made and is attractive and was offered at a great price with great service. As advertised product PLUS a little bit better!
customer_reviews.author: volcanohouse Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: not the right mounting bracket
customer_reviews.text: The product was just the right size for the project I was trying to finish. Unfortunately the mounting bracket that was sent did not fit the sink that was shipped. The mounting bracket was about an inch too long for the sink to match. I might have to wait for the new mount to be shipped to me or I might have to cut the sides of the bracket to accommodate the sink
customer_reviews.author: Sang Lee

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. We have a small bathroom and it is hard to replace such a small sink. It looks great. Be careful to buy faucets that fit the openings. AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bracket is a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: The sink is perfect for my powder room however the bracket is a joke. Took us over 5 hours to figure it out without any directions. How hard could it be, we are both colllege educated and it was a nightmare. Try reversing bracket so the "ears" face towards the wall. You'll thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Really small and fit like a glove in a powder room I made smaller
customer_reviews.text: Really small and fit like a glove in a powder room I made smaller, perfect for just rinsing your hands and looked really cool too...
customer_reviews.author: mark lento

customer_reviews.title: Just received the sink came in good shape I have my installed it yet but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received the sink came in good shape I have my installed it yet but it is the perfect size I needed and looks very well made ,also delivered much sooner than expected which is great since I need it for a rental unit
customer_reviews.author: chris salemi

customer_reviews.title: Installation hardware not included in order.
customer_reviews.text: The hardware was not included and it was not shipped in a "factory sealed box". Do not want to have to go through returning the item -- just want the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sink is a godsend for anyone who needs a truly small sink
customer_reviews.author: KGentry

customer_reviews.title: If you need a small sink this is it.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a small sink this is it. Arrived very well packed.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Had a very tight space, had to redo the bathroom this little sink is perfect absolutely adorable. I would recommend this seller
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent small sink for a small bathroom. Very attractive when installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: After a lengthy search
customer_reviews.text: This sink is just the right size for our tiny powder room, and has the vintage touch we we seeking. We have yet to install it, but the mounting hardware appears to be adequate for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W

customer_reviews.title: it looks like the reseller not the manufacterer
customer_reviews.text: the hardware provided does not fit the product, it looks like the reseller not the manufacterer, not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: The finished install looks great. `
customer_reviews.text: Due to limited space I was left with the option of no sink in a second bathroom until I found the worlds smallest sink. The finished install looks great.`
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect sink for our small restroom
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect sink for our small restroom. I had been looking everywhere and couldn't find one. I am very happy to have found this one. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little sink
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for for an old farmhouse. It did not come with mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Moyer

customer_reviews.title: The sink is perfect - just what we wanted - the mounting hardware ...
customer_reviews.text: The sink is perfect - just what we wanted - the mounting hardware and instructions however were not good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great little sink!
customer_reviews.text: It was the best choice for the space we had to put it in. The depth is perfect and the water won't splash out when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Walker

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were actually white
customer_reviews.text: This sink is replacing a 1930's sink. The old one is whiter than the new one. I was hoping to put in a nice, shiney new white sink but this sink is not white. It's going in a corner so maybe we can get used to it. We'll try to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: BAH

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The sink is perfect for my tight space. Wonder why a full size sink is $32 at Home Depot but this was $91 with shipping. The mounting bracket is close to worthless, I had to put additional bracing to support the sink properly. Other than price and bracket, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We haven't installed this yet, but needed a small sink for our tiny bathroom. It is great quality, very modern looking and was shipped fast to bush Alaska with no damage. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucep

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There are no mounting instructions with the sink. The supplied bracket cannot be installed without modification.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Shea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what i need
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised a very small bathroom sink. Perfect for what i need.
customer_reviews.author: shelby edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our laundry room and it fits perfectly between the washer and dryer. Handy, dandy little sink...
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Restani

customer_reviews.title: the sink is nice and shipping was very fast
customer_reviews.text: only had one mounting bracket and it was the wrong type no way it would work. I had to make a custom bracket ! the sink is nice and shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: steve roush

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer stated "the mounting bracket is inadequate" otherwise I would rate it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for small spaces. I have also modified the mounting bracket as mentioned by other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeev Singla

customer_reviews.title: Bracket is no good...
customer_reviews.text: Sink is nice, but the bracket is horrible and came with absolutely NO instructions. I had to customize the bracket to make it work, which doubled the typical install time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Trent Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great for the small space that i had to work with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small but just what we needed for the space we had.
customer_reviews.author: Billy H.

customer_reviews.title: sink
customer_reviews.text: Recived quickly packed in two boxes. The original an then bubble rapped in box 2. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keith / Anna

customer_reviews.title: small sink
customer_reviews.text: We have a tiny downstairs bathroom and found this small sink perfect for that space. Nothing fancy and it is definitely small, but invites many comments from guests! Easy to install. No problem with the brackets that others mentioned, though they are not the highest quality, they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thibbitts

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Definitely small! Needs more instructions, and more hardware. The hardware would not support this sink on our wall. It was also very confusing how to use this hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny sink for a tiny home
customer_reviews.text: I am renovating a 1960's trailer home-what a perfect size for my Tiny home! Good quality,good bracket,fair price. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Fits our space just fine. The Decor Star PU-002-TC will not fit this ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits our space just fine. The Decor Star PU-002-TC will not fit this sink!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we are quite satisfied. It was installed in a small toilet area ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, we are quite satisfied. It was installed in a small toilet area at our church. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Small wall mount Bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition. perfect sizer for our small camp bathroom. Fix right over Using same bracket as we already had. Faucets from old sink fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth E. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: It's tough to find small sinks like this in the store so I appreciated this company's stock and how fast the sink arrived like others have commented. However the bracket did not work at all, and there was a slight imperfection on the side. That's the basis of 3 stars. Be advised, finding a faucet and a trap that fits this sink is very difficult so make sure you measure thoroughly before heading off to buy the components/hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Whit M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is great for what I needed on very tight space
customer_reviews.author: atokato

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small bathroom. My application required fabricating a new bracket but the quality of the sink is great.
customer_reviews.author: mike hagan

customer_reviews.title: Have a tiny bathroom. This works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great. Delivery time much shorter than was initially told. Works best with a bar faucet because it is compact.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M

customer_reviews.title: Small bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: The sink seems to be the perfect size for our small bathroom. It arrived quickly and in tack. However, the wall mount bracket did not fit and was of poor quality in that it did not support the sink. I was forced to seek out an alternative. This problem is an irritant and should never have happened.
customer_reviews.author: David Eggenberger

customer_reviews.title: Nice but cannot return
customer_reviews.text: This sink is too small for our bathroom, and this seller either does not accept returns or does not return emails. Either way, we have a brand new sink and it is too small. Be sure you can use this small of a sink before you buy it as you may be stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lund

product_meta.title: Small Wall Mount Bathroom Sink 12.4"x11" White
product_meta.description: A welcoming addition to any bathroom or powder room, this wall hung sink is Constructed of durable and stain-resistant vitreous china, this white sink, simple yet fashionable is sure to leave an upgraded impression on your bathroom. The brackets need to be screwed onto the wall, loosely. It shouldn't be too tight. The sink then needs to be stuck on to the wall with silicon glue (or any good glue recommended by your local hardware store.) Once the sink is on the wall, the screws should be tightened for full support. Please note: The bracket is not strong enough to hold the sink. You need the glue. The brackets are just for extra support.
feature_bullets: Sink is constructed from high quality water resistant Grade AAA Vitreous China.
Features a concealed round overflow, yet sleek, prevents water leaks and spills without spoiling its elegance. Faucet can be purchased separately..
Sink’s dimensions are 12.4” x 11”, overall approximate weight is 14 Lbs., 4” CC spread hole. White Color.
Experience the pleasure of hassle free enhancing. No assembly needed. Requires simple installation- hardware included.
This skillfully designed wall-mounted sink is sure to add style and beauty to your bathroom, vanity, or washroom without occupying much space.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
